articles.title: Dow Jones Futures: Tesla, Nvidia Lead 5 Giants In Buy Areas; Market Strong As 2025 Wanes
articles.mainIdea: Dow Jones Futures: Tesla, Nvidia Lead 5 Giants In Buy Areas; Market Strong As 2025 Wanes
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Dow Jones Futures: Tesla, Nvidia Lead 5 Giants In Buy Areas; Market Strong As 2025 Wanes. The stock market is right at record highs heading into the end of 2025. Tesla, Nvidia, Google and Apple are all just above buy points. Related tickers mentioned: AAPL, GOOG, NVDA, TSLA, ^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC.
